Description:
Detects external IP address lookups by non-browser processes via services such as "api.ipify.org". This could be indicative of potential post compromise internet test activity.

Author: Janantha Marasinghe, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Network Connection to IP Lookup Service APIs
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((dst_host = 'www.ip.cn' or dst_host = 'l2.io') and (dst_host like '%api.2ip.ua%' or dst_host like '%api.bigdatacloud.net%' or dst_host like '%api.ipify.org%' or dst_host like '%bot.whatismyipaddress.com%' or dst_host like '%canireachthe.net%' or dst_host like '%checkip.amazonaws.com%' or dst_host like '%checkip.dyndns.org%' or dst_host like '%curlmyip.com%' or dst_host like '%db-ip.com%' or dst_host like '%edns.ip-api.com%' or dst_host like '%eth0.me%' or dst_host like '%freegeoip.app%' or dst_host like '%geoipy.com%' or dst_host like '%getip.pro%' or dst_host like '%icanhazip.com%' or dst_host like '%ident.me%' or dst_host like '%ifconfig.io%' or dst_host like '%ifconfig.me%' or dst_host like '%ip-api.com%' or dst_host like '%ip.360.cn%' or dst_host like '%ip.anysrc.net%' or dst_host like '%ip.taobao.com%' or dst_host like '%ip.tyk.nu%' or dst_host like '%ipaddressworld.com%' or dst_host like '%ipapi.co%' or dst_host like '%ipconfig.io%' or dst_host like '%ipecho.net%' or dst_host like '%ipinfo.io%' or dst_host like '%ipip.net%' or dst_host like '%ipof.in%' or dst_host like '%ipv4.icanhazip.com%' or dst_host like '%ipv4bot.whatismyipaddress.com%' or dst_host like '%ipv6-test.com%' or dst_host like '%ipwho.is%' or dst_host like '%jsonip.com%' or dst_host like '%myexternalip.com%' or dst_host like '%seeip.org%' or dst_host like '%wgetip.com%' or dst_host like '%whatismyip.akamai.com%' or dst_host like '%whois.pconline.com.cn%' or dst_host like '%wtfismyip.com%')) and  not (process_path like '%\maxthon.exe' or process_path like '%\safari.exe' or process_path like '%\seamonkey.exe' or process_path like '%\brave.exe' or (process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe') or (process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe') or (process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft\EdgeWebView\Application\%' and process_path like '%\WindowsApps\MicrosoftEdge.exe' and (process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft\Edge\Application\msedge.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft\Edge\Application\msedge.exe')) or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft\EdgeCore\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft\EdgeCore\%') and (process_path like '%\msedge.exe' or process_path like '%\msedgewebview2.exe')) or process_path like '%\opera.exe' or process_path like '%\vivaldi.exe' or process_path like '%\whale.exe' or (process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe')))
